summary: An ordinance submitting the qualified voters of the City of Seattle, at the general election to be held in such City Tuesday, May 8, 1923, the proposition for the creation of an indebtedness in the sum of Five Hundred Thousand ($500,000.00) Dollars by the issuance and sale of general negotiable interest bearing coupon bonds of the City of Seattle in said amount, for the construction of the Montlake Stadium Bridge, across the Lake Washington Canal at Montlake Boulevard in said City.
